titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 3605) to establish the San Rafael Western Legacy District in the State of Utah, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 106-654, by Mr. Hastings (WA).

Rule provides for consideration of H.R. 3605 with 1 hour of general debate. Previous question shall be considered as ordered without intervening motions except motion to recommit with or without instructions. Makes in order as an original bill the Committee on resources amendment in the nature of a substitute now printed in the bill as an original bill for the purpsoe of amendment. Measure will be considered read. Bill is open to amendments. The amendment printed in H.Rept. 106-654 shall be considered as read. The bill shall be considered for amendment under the five-minute rule.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 233.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 516.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 6/6/2000--Introduced. Sets forth the rule (open) for the consideration of H.R. 3605 (establishing the San Rafael Western Legacy District in Utah).
